label: 奏事
対訳語: documentary form used by the Council of State for memorializing middling issues by the Council of State
説明文: There were three styles used to memorialize by the Council of State: ronzō, sōji, binsō. Sōji were mostly used to memorialize affairs of state, but less serious issues were treated in ronzō. Binsō treated more daily matters. [論奏、奏事、便奏]
